import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Swal from 'sweetalert2' import axios from "axios"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { Button, Modal, ModalHeader, ModalBody, ModalFooter, Label, Input, FormGroup } from 'reactstrap'; import Upimg from './Upimg'; import prueba from './prueba'; function Index() { const [modal, setModal] = useState(false); const toggle = () => setModal(!modal); const navigator = useNavigate() const [data, setData] = useState({ name: '', title: '', description: '', price: '', amount: '', }) function handle(e) { e.preventDefault(); const newdata = { ...data } newdata[e.target.id] = e.target.value setData(newdata) console.log(newdata) } const url = 'http://localhost:3000/api/product/create' function Enviar() { Swal.fire( 'Que Bien!', 'Se Agrego nuevo producto', 'success' ) axios.post(url, { name: data.name, title: data.title, description: data.description, price: data.price, amount: data.amount, }) .then(res => { console.log(res.data) }) //toggle(false); //navigator('/') } return (
